item.title: How to Close the Microsoft Sticky Notes App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Close the Notes List and Sticky Notes With Right Click How to Close the Notes List: With Click With Hover With Menu With Keyboard Shortcuts How to Close a Sticky Note: With Click With Hover With Menu With Keyboard Shortcuts No time to scroll down? Click through these tutorial slides: Watch a video tutorial: How to Close the Notes List and Sticky Notes With Right Click Step 1: First open the Sticky Notes app.
